Title: A Bunch of Hornballs
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Alison Bennett, Philippe Iujvidin (story editor)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: Jimmy goes out of town for a book convention; Gretchen decides to throw a divorce party for Lindsay, leading to an unsuspected visit from Paul; Edgar's friend encourages him to overspend on party planning.
